snippet.title: Biomass Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Available on Steam October 8th : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1138960/Biomass/ 
Edit: Actually October 13th, last delay, I promise!

Explore and plunder the ruins of a sinking metropolis in this hand crafted action RPG. Clash beam sabers, or be a gunslinger. Make alliances or go it alone. Your actions have consequences - areas and events will alter depending on your choices. 

Carve your own unique path through what remains of humanity, and uncover the secrets of the eternal lighthouse!
